segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's about to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilted, and he's stretched out so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for a cookie, not helping him at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a risky situation, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that boy doesn't hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
